name: Knight vs Killer Robots [Trijam 190]
description:
Knight Vs Killer Robots

Trijam Jam 190 Theme was "Enemies all around".

Instructions 

Used dpad or WASD key to move, Space or Fire button to attack, avoid touching the killer robot even when destroyed. Survive as long as possible killing as many as you can.

press R to Reset.

Plot

Who needs a plot device when you have a knight slashing at evil killer robots.

Bug

The are so many bugs, the main one is the robots will get stuck eventually when respawning.

Credits

Code, sounds, and Killer Robot art and animation by me.

Title Image by HairyFarmersDaughter.

Knight Animation from Fantasy Knight - Free Pixelart Animated Character.

Tile Set from Ashlands Tileset.

Music by neocrey.
